mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ta_point (point_name, remarks_name, point_type, point_unit, block_no,file_relative_path,file_prefix_name, state, init_date, init_user, mod_date, mod_user) VALUES (#{pointName}, #{remarksName}, #{pointType}, #{pointUnit}, #{blockNo},#{fileRelativePath},#{filePrefixName}, #{state}, now(), #{initUser}, now(), #{modUser});

update ta_point set <if test="pointName!=null and pointName!=''"> point_name = #{pointName}, </if> <if test="remarksName!=null and remarksName!=''"> remarks_name = #{remarksName}, </if> <if test="pointType!=null and pointType!=''"> point_type = #{pointType}, </if> <if test="pointUnit!=null and pointUnit!=''"> point_unit = #{pointUnit}, </if> <if test="blockNo!=null and blockNo!=''"> block_no = #{blockNo}, </if> <if test="fileRelativePath!=null and fileRelativePath!=''"> file_relative_path = #{fileRelativePath}, </if> <if test="filePrefixName!=null and filePrefixName!=''"> file_prefix_name = #{filePrefixName}, </if> mod_date=now(), mod_user = #{modUser} where point_id = #{pointId}
mapper.select: select point_id as pointId, point_name as pointName, remarks_name as remarksName, point_type as pointType, point_unit as pointUnit, block_no as blockNo, file_relative_path as fileRelativePath, file_prefix_name as filePrefixName from ta_point where point_name = #{point_name}

select point_id as pointId, point_name as pointName, remarks_name as remarksName, point_type as pointType, point_unit as pointUnit, block_no as blockNo, file_relative_path as fileRelativePath, file_prefix_name as filePrefixName from ta_point where point_id = #{point_id}
select * from ta_point where point_id in (${pointIds}) order by point_name asc
select * from ta_point where point_name like CONCAT('%',#{point_name},'%') order by point_name asc
